Title: Dark Iron from Above
Description:
We've done our best to contain the High Speaker's followers. We've hampered their efforts at destroying or looting anything they can take with them into Hall of Awakening.

Now, we just need to deal with the leader of their forces before they can coordinate a more unified resistance.

Are you ready to do this, $n?
ObjectivesText: Defeat Supervisor Varric and his forces within the Earthenworks.
PortraitGiverText: Leads the zealous loyalists of High Speaker Eirich in the Earthenworks. Sees non-conformity as defiance, non-compliance, or deviance.
RewardText:
The Ringing Deeps should be safe... for now. But the High Speaker...

We need to follow Speaker Brinthe into the Hall of Awakening.
